List of Items Controlled
Related Controls:
(1) See ECCN 2D201 for “software” for items controlled under this entry. (2) See ECCNs 2E001 (“development”), 2E002 (“production”), and 2E201 (“use”) for technology for items controlled under this entry.
Related Definitions:
N/A
Items:
a. Centrifugal balancing machines designed for balancing flexible rotors having a length of 600 mm or more and having all of the following characteristics:
2B229.a
Swing or journal diameter greater than 75 mm;
a.1. Swing or journal diameter greater than 75 mm;
Mass capability of from 0.9 to 23 kg; and
a.2. Mass capability of from 0.9 to 23 kg; and
Capable of balancing speed of revolution greater than 5,000 r.p.m.;
a.3. Capable of balancing speed of revolution greater than 5,000 r.p.m.;
Centrifugal balancing machines designed for balancing hollow cylindrical rotor “parts” or “components” and having all of the following characteristics:
b. Centrifugal balancing machines designed for balancing hollow cylindrical rotor “parts” or “components” and having all of the following characteristics:
Journal diameter greater than 75 mm;
b.1. Journal diameter greater than 75 mm;
Mass capability of from 0.9 to 23 kg;
b.2. Mass capability of from 0.9 to 23 kg;
A minimum achievable residual specific unbalance equal to or less than 10 g-mm/kg per plane; and
b.3. A minimum achievable residual specific unbalance equal to or less than 10 g-mm/kg per plane; and
Belt drive type.
b.4. Belt drive type.
